Visit Tarragona

Enjoy culture and sports in this vibrant district called PortAventura.

Top three activities to do at PortAventura

Attend a show in PortAventura Park

The PortAventura Park is a great place to spend your summer holidays.

Go for a picnic in the Caribe Aquatic Park

Come and explore PortAventura’s Caribe Aquatic Park, a water wonderland featuring waterslides, wave machines, and lots of water.

Play sports at the Ferrari Land

Attractions and games: Champions Race · Maranello Grand Race · Red Force · Ferrari Land Gallery · Thrill Towers · Racing Legends · Crazy Pistons
